name: mongoid
description: generate mongo objectids, turn hex strings into objectids
readme:
# mongoid

  generate and initialize mongo objectids without installing mongodb.

## Installation

    npm install mongoid

## Example

```js
var oid = require('mongoid');
oid() // "51186a029cc9cefe18000001"
oid("51186a029cc9cefe18000001").getTimestamp() // Sun Feb 10 2013 ...
```
